definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: Cheng also answered questions of the journalists.
sentences.chinese: 程国平还回答了记者提问。

sentences.english: Please introduce yourself and your media outlet when you ask a question.
sentences.chinese: 请在提问时先介绍一下您自己和您所代表的媒体。

sentences.english: Mr. Burke was able to quiz the recruiters almost exclusively through email.
sentences.chinese: 布尔克可以基本上只通过电子邮件向招聘人员提问。

sentences.english: And if they play seriously, the quiz master's going to destroy the other person.
sentences.chinese: 如果他们是较真的，提问者能轻易地打败另一个人。

sentences.english: Plaese fell free to ask any questions.
sentences.chinese: 有任何问题，请尽管提问。

sentences.english: Ma Zhaoxu answered the question of journalists on the Cheonan Ship.
sentences.chinese: 马朝旭就“天安号”事件回答了记者提问。

sentences.english: The press conference now begins. I am ready to take your questions.
sentences.chinese: 记者会开始，现在我愿意回答各位的提问。

sentences.english: Question in this place we go where the jurisdiction of the Yuan Dynasty, when?
sentences.chinese: 提问我们这个地方在元朝时归哪里管辖？

sentences.english: Ask and answer the questions in activity 3a.
sentences.chinese: 提问并回答活动3a中的问题。

sentences.english: Following the briefing, Zhao Jun and Cui Tiankai took questions from the journalists.
sentences.chinese: 介绍情况后，赵军和崔天凯回答了记者的提问。

sentences.english: We would like to have your questions.
sentences.chinese: 您的问题将有机会获选向骆家辉提问。

sentences.english: This method of questioning elicited some surprising revelations.
sentences.chinese: 这种提问的方式引出了一些惊人的发现。

sentences.english: But it's a very non-affrontive way to pose the question.
sentences.chinese: 但这是一种委婉的提问方式。

sentences.english: Here’s how I get the best results.
sentences.chinese: 我怎样才能得到最好的提问结果呢？

sentences.english: "Off-the-wall" Questions, also known as "Wild Card" or "No-Right-Answer" Questions.
sentences.chinese: 非正常的提问，或者叫没有答案的问题。

sentences.english: Later Li also answered questions of the journalists.
sentences.chinese: 介绍情况后，李辉还回答了记者提问。

definition: to question/to ask/to raise a question
to question closely/to investigate in detail/to examine minutely/to get to the heart of the matter
to answer questions (as teacher or consultant)/to clarify doubts
to compete to be the first to answer a question (as on a quiz show)
